comment: Pope crowned Mary as Queen of Heaven recently in Chile. Mary has been crowned Queen of Heaven on many depictions, icons and statues of her. Just like Jesus, Mary allegedly 'ascended to heaven' without dying mortal's death, and is Queen thereof interceding on behalf of believers with her son. That is what Catholics and Orthodox believe. Mary is your Goddess.
